name: Bear's Home Repairs
description:
Help Bear fix his broken doors and windows. Watch out for unwanted guests! Your loadout will switch every 10 seconds.

Made for the Ludum Dare 51 Jam.
Theme: Every 10 seconds.

Controls:

  • E to repair doors & windows
  • LMB to use active item
  • 1, 2 to switch between active items

Programmers:

  • Zuhair Ghias
  • Mahad Gul
  • George
  • Alexander Mastryukov

Artists:

  • Axel Kuomaa (3D Lead)
  • Angelo Hizon (3D)
  • Michael Milani (3D)
  • Tina Zhang (2D)

Soundtrack & Audio:

  • Gus

Project Manager:
